text: Hey, Can you change directly in HubSpot ? <https://app-eu1.HubSpot.com/design-manager/27207465/code/93931624136?tfid=93932632276>
<@U01QVR44MEY> is it possible to delay for more than a few minutes? Like a few days for example? Or does the workflow action time out?
Yes, it’s technically possible to delay for up to 3 days but it’s very much a hack and I would highly recommend against it.
What are you trying to build?
